item.title: Deploy your React-Django app on Heroku
item.description: This is a follow up to my post on setting up a React-Django web app. You can take a quick glance if you’ve not seen it yet. TL;DR: The setup is deployed at http://react-django.herokuapp.com (nothing much there actually) and the code at https://github.com/nicholaskajoh/React-Django. We’re going to be deploying the app we setup in the previous post on Heroku. Heroku is a popular cloud hosting platform (PaaS) and offers a generous free tier which we’ll be using.
